content.rendered:
• Best for surgery and treatment require magnification of 2x to 3x
  • The bright field of view provides easy steropsis
  • Easy and comfortable to use
  • Adjustable observation distance by rotating the lens barrel
  • BLD-3 is best for surgery and treatment at close distance, for example use in dental practice
BLS-1 BLS-2 BLS-3 BLD-3
Magnification 1.5x to 2.0x 2.0x to 2.5x 2.5x to 3.0x 2.5x to 3.0x
Working Distance (mm) 550 to 350 550 to 350 550 to 350 350 to 250
Field of View Diameter (mm) Ф145 to 120 Ф113 to 58 Ф78 to 38 Ф80 to 50

excerpt.rendered: BLS-1 BLS-2 BLS-3 BLD-3 Magnification 1.5x to 2.0x 2.0x to 2.5x 2.5x to 3.0x 2.5x to 3.0x Working Distance (mm) 550 to 350 550 to 350 550 to 350 350 to 250 Field of View Diameter (mm) Ф145 to 120 Ф113 to 58 Ф78 to 38 Ф80 to 50
